thread.section_title: iQ Hotel Roma - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Clean, modern, well-designed, and delicious breakfast
thread.title_full: Clean, modern, well-designed, and delicious breakfast - Review of iQ Hotel Roma, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Jennifer P
title: Clean, modern, well-designed, and delicious breakfast
text: I am very satisfied with this hotel. Though I wouldn't call it luxurious, it was everything I needed in a trip to Rome -- quiet, conveniently located, clean, and attractive. As a single woman, I was extremely comfortable there. The breakfast was delicious, and the service from the front desk to the cafe personnel was outstanding. Great value!
